value:
Don't expect me to bow to royalty.
The Flame Tribe only gives respect
to those who earn it.

No matter how far I journey from
home, I am never lonely. My tribe
is always with me in spirit.

Are those...sweets? Who told you I...
Fine. I will take them off your hands,
but just this once.

You ever tried sumo? It's the ideal
test of strength. Let's go for a round,
$Nu. Come on!

The marks on my face? These are
traditional Flame Tribe tattoos.
They are meant to ward off evil.

I am Rinkah, of the Flame Tribe.
$Nf sent me, but
I need no formal welcome.

The spirit of the Flame Tribe guides
me to greater and greater heights!
Good, but not enough. I need more!

Ugh. I've let my hunger get the best
of me. What a disgrace...

I try to avoid involving myself too
much with people, but...thanks.

I am Rinkah, of the Flame Tribe. I'll
fight for you, and I'll keep my word,
but don't expect any more than that.

My portion at dinner was twice what
it usually is, for some reason. Was
that you, $Nu?$k$pWell, you don't need to butter me up.
I get along just fine on what everyone
else around here eats.$k$pIf giving me a bigger meal than even
Alfonse and Sharena was some kind
of ploy to get me in your debt...$k$pWell, it didn't work. Totally failed.
In fact, I didn't even notice. Ugh,
fine, obviously I noticed...$k$pLook, if there's something you want,
you don't have to do all that for me.
Just ask next time, OK?
ふん！
でりゃあっ！
ぐっ…
くそっ…！
My flame won't flicker!
You're done!
A flame burns within me!
Can't take the heat?
Snuffed out…
Hmph!
I am Rinkah, daughter of the Flame Tribe's honorable chieftain.
Hands off.
I've got fire in my veins. Cut me, and you'll get burned.
I owe Corrin for saving my life. Until that debt is paid, I won't stand idle.
Why is everyone so delicate about eating? Utensils only get in the way.
The Flame Tribe prides itself on its independence. We rely on outsiders for nothing.
I've grown a lot, thanks to you. Let's stick together a while longer, OK?
Let me at 'em.
Don't mess this up.
I'm on fire.
